# This is the status of the plugin. The status can be either beta or productive, whereas productive is set by default.
# Usage of beta plugins needs to be activated by hand with the --usebetaplugins
#status=beta

# If a plugin is backward compatible, then you can set this via compatibleto. Roddy then knows, that other plugins referring to a previous
# version of this one, are also allowed to use the newest version. Also the potential mixup of several plugin version would then basically
# be possible.
compatibleto=1.0.33

# Versions of the runtime environment, including the Roddy API version.
JDKVersion=1.8
GroovyVersion=2.4
RoddyAPIVersion=2.3
